resources.string: This service allows the app to open its screen when WhatsApp is launched.
It is required to inform you about the applock status and any important actions needed.\n\nYou can disable specific types of notifications in the settings.
Access to device\'s usage statistics is required to monitor when an app opens to show the lock screen if necessary.\n\nSelect Lockation and allow in the next window.
Accessibility service is required to monitor when an app opens to show the lock screen if necessary.\n\nSelect this app and allow in the next window.
It is required to show the lock screen when you open a locked app.\n\nSelect Lockation and allow in the next window.
It is required to get information about your current Location and connected WiFi to un/lock apps.
It is required to be able to monitor Location and WiFi changes to un/lock the apps.\n\nMake sure to select \"Allow all the time\" in the settings.
Enter your mobile number to receive one\ntime password
Please enter a valid mobile number.
Please enter your email or mobile number
